examples.example: 每天我都会沿着湖边跑一公里，享受运动带来的快乐。

translate.english: Every day I will run one kilometer along the lake and enjoy the happiness brought by sports.

examples.example: 为了保持健康，我每天坚持步行一公里。

translate.english: In order to keep healthy, I insist on walking one kilometer every day.

examples.example: 我决定每天多走一公里，让自己的身体更健康，心情更愉悦。

translate.english: I decide to walk one more kilometer every day to make my body healthier and my mood more joyful.
